ai.summary: An ultra-short, easy walk along the +B40 South Diversion in the UK. At only 0.3 km, it’s ideal for a quick stroll, suitable for families and beginners seeking a low-impact outdoor activity.
ai.terrain_summary: The route features a flat, well-maintained surface—typically tarmac, paved path, or compacted gravel. Expect minimal elevation change, with possible damp patches after rain and occasional shaded sections.
ai.safety_notes: This is a very short walk, but standard outdoor safety applies: stay on marked paths, be mindful of other pedestrians, and check local conditions before you go. In urban or canal-adjacent areas, watch for cyclists and low-hanging branches. Wear sturdy shoes, bring a light layer for unexpected weather, and keep valuables secure.
recommended_gear: Phone with offline map or local guidance
ai.best_seasons: Year-round in the UK, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and autumn when temperatures are mild and daylight is comfortable.

seo.title: +B40 South Diversion Walk – Easy 0.3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover an ultra-short, easy 0.3 km hike on the +B40 South Diversion in the UK. Flat terrain, family-friendly and accessible year-round.
